title: Glory, Glory, Hallowed Blue GA
description:
- Celebrating the great victory for our shiny cerulean antifa state! 
 - Hear our entire production meeting as a preshow treat, not a postproduction glitch! It's mostly about the dadlife murder fantasia "Yellowstone" masquerading as prestige television and the people who have lied to us about that.
 - Is Mark Richt totally Mark Wrecked over Kirby winning a title with yet another no-account quarterback?
 - From the Great Beyond of parental leave, hear Ryan's theory about what took so long for Georgia to get this one done!
 - Jason returns home with a newfound appreciation for Indianapolis!
 - Everyone on the show adds "Get in a barfight on GMA" to their respective bucket lists.
 - The gang invents an entirely new kind of funeral, the “Catch-a-Carl."
 - Welcome to the Fullcast EU, airborne sensei Ronald O. Hamburger!
 - Spencer mixes up "less than zero chance" with "greater than zero chance" – will this have consequences?? 
 - Visit sunny preownedairboats.com

      
Learn more about your ad choices. Visit megaphone.fm/adchoices
